questions.question: What are the three components of the cell theory?
options: All living things are made of cells; cells come from non-living matter; cells are the basic unit of life
All living things are made of cells; cells are the basic units of structure and function; new cells come from existing cells
Cells contain a nucleus; all cells have cell walls; cells are the basic unit of life
All organisms are multicellular; cells are the basic unit of life; cells come from pre-existing cells
questions.answer: All living things are made of cells; cells are the basic units of structure and function; new cells come from existing cells
